title: Design for disaster
creator_contributor_role: Cinematography Unit, LA City Fire Department, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest fires
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Fire fighters
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest fires - Prevention and control
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fire fighters
description: In 1959 brush fires in the Los Angeles forest area made fire officers describe the region as being a "design for disaster". This film shows the fire in November 1961 which destroyed 250 homes, without loss of life. It explains its causes and tries to suggest possible remedies.
